name: Dr. Schplot's Nanobots
description:
A challenging, story-driven puzzle adventure that takes place inside your intestines!
Reclusive scientist Dr. Schplot invented a crazy cast of life-saving nanobots that now live inside of every human being on the planet. These tiny nanobots were originally designed to fight disease, maintain organs, and extend lifespan from within our bodies. The bad news is they have gone rogue and are taking over! It is now up to you to guide an army of new and improved nanobots on a journey to save humankind!

Solve unique tricky puzzles as you battle a wide variety of misbehaving micro-machines. Recycle their spare parts to build ever more powerful new allies, collect cute characters and build an army to cure every last human in the wacky world of Dr. Schplot’s Nanobots!Key Features● Unique gameplay: puzzle game with experimental puzzle mechanics!
● No in-app purchases or ads!
● Master challenging puzzles
● Collect wacky nanobots and assemble your army
● Make use of unique abilities to defeat stubborn enemies
● Find out the identity of the reclusive Dr. Schplot!
● Play events to collect rare nanobots to complete your collection
● 100% indie - made by 1 guy and 1 gal, no office, no publishers, no funding, lots of caffeine

We hope you'll love our puzzle game! Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support@middlecitygames.com
